items.name: A-line gown with voluminous lurex sleeves 851
items.desc: Shining at any time of the day or night is the fashionable mission of this season. And it will be made with ease by you thanks to the ultra-fashionable A-line dress! The flawless fit, the versatile length just above the knee and the main highlight - the metallic sheen of the long wide sleeves with cuffs at the bottom will make this dress the most favorite thing in your wardrobe.

items.name: Premium viscose dress LPL 1044
items.desc: A premium quality viscose dress LPL 1044 is a must-have in the wardrobe of stylish and confident girls. Stylish lettering pattern will help to make your everyday look memorable and individual.

items.name: Premium viscose striped sleeveless dress LPL 1141
items.desc: With a form-fitting top, a laconic black and white stripe, a delicately assembled A-line skirt, a premium viscose textured canvas, the LPL 1141 model makes it easy to create the most daring office and evening plans.
